prompts.prompt: I need a build for web application that takes SAML request for login and calls an external IDP through Rest API, authenticates user and generates SAML response to the client

I need a web application that takes authentication requests from users, makes a REST API call to https://chfs.verify.ibm.com/v1.0/endpoint/default/token with client_id: 6fab4d0a-6102-4e8f-b2b5-c2016bcefe9a and client_secret: 4cGyfQAaVI to receive bearer token and authenticate users at the endpoint https://chfs.verify.ibm.com/v2.0/Users/authentication?returnUserRecord=true, generates SAML response to the user from the auth token following asking for consent to send SAML response.
